Name: Endure Island
About the game: Basic Description You find yourself standing on an empty deserted island. Survive on an ever-changing desert island! The goal of the player is to survive as long as possible on a deserted island, while keeping the changes under control. Keep the fight going by balancing the acquisition of weapons with keeping the changes on the deserted island in check. This game was created using Unreal Engine 4, and 99.9% of the production process is shown on YouTube with explanations. I hope it will be of some help in game production. Pickup Various enemies 　Running zombies, tree zombies, flying insects, goats that tell the player's position around them, and other enemies will attack. Obtaining Weapons 　Guns and bullets are found on the map. 　If you want a stronger weapon, get it from the supply drops that often fall from the sky. 　The performance of the guns you pick up will vary from one individual to another and will deteriorate with continued use, so look for a better weapon! Night 　At night the zombies become more active, so be cautious. 　Zombies appear in large numbers, and zombies that did not run during the day will start running. Mutants 　There are special enemies on the map called mutants. 　When mutants roam around, they change the environment and cause new enemies to appear. 　Find and defeat them as quickly as possible and delay the mutation of the enemies that appear. Dangerous Plants 　There are poisonous mushrooms that multiply while spreading poison and polluted flowers that change the environment of the desert island, so deal with them as soon as you see them. Premonition 　Noise will tell you the direction in which serious problems are occurring. 　Get your ears done and get to your destination.
